channel.title: Use Programming to create Content for my Blog and Clients
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I'm the founder of Growista. A site where I use my programming skills to analyze data and write about it.
I also offer this service to clients, most of whom have been SaaS companies.
I've managed to score some decent publicity, managed to get some write-ups, and even got mentioned in Forbes.
You can check out my site (growista DOT com) if you're curious about my process.
Though I'm doing consulting work now, I hope to switch to products of some kind as I build my audience. Happy to meet and connect with all of you.
